co.uk.niadel.mpi.util

Class FileUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.uk.niadel.mpi.util.FileUtils

  • public final class FileUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Partially borrowed and modified code from the N-API installer. I have plans to make a universal library of mine (which will include DoubleMap) to make this sort of thing unecessary.
    Author:
    Niadel

      static void cloneFiles(java.io.InputStream from, java.io.OutputStream to)
      Does copyFile, but only does streams and doesn't check if the Files exist.
      static void copyFile(java.io.File from, java.io.File to)
      Copies an individual file to another, replacing the existing to file with the from after checking the files exist.
      static void copyFilesRecursively(java.io.File from, java.io.File to)
      Copies directories recursively, with the help of a StackOverflow answer.

      Like the above method, only it does it with zip files.
